name: The Junkpit
description:
You're a brawler looking to proving yourself in the Junkpit, this scrappile of a town's main attraction. A gifted tinkerer has crafted a suit for you, the rest is up to your talent. 

Fight for as long as you can, and you might actually leave victorious.

This is my nod to those old preinstalled windows games you played when the internet was gone and had nothing else, but I also took this as an opportunity to finally make something with my characters!

Controls:

  • Arrow keys to move
  • C to swing your weapon
  • X to dash
